catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Ezobi, Jehoseph ben Hanan ben Nathan
description: Contents: Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi, Beḥinat ʿolam (The Examination of the World) (ff. 1r-29r). Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi, Ketav hitnatslut (Letter of Apology) (ff. 29v-96v). Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi, Baḳashat ha-memin (ff. 97r-102v). Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi, Elohim elay atah ashaḥarekhah (ff. 102v-103v). Abraham ben Isaac Bedersi, Baḳashat ha-lamedin (ff. 104r-107r). Joseph ben Sheshet ibn Latimi, Aamir et Adoni (ff. 107r-114r). Jehoseph ben Hanan ben Nathan Ezobi, Keʿarat kesef (ff. 114v-123r). Moses ben Isaac da Rieti, Miḳdash meʿaṭ (Meʻon ha-shoʼalim) (ff. 124r-128r).
